content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message to execute the shell command "export DISPLAY=:1 && Xvfb :1 -screen 0 1024x768x24 -ac &", which my computer successfully executed with PID '715'. Additionally, I received Python code to draw a river using the turtle module with the basename "river_drawing".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "export DISPLAY=:1"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "import turtle\\n\\n# Set up the turtle screen\\nscreen = turtle.Screen()\\n\\n# Set up the turtle\\nriver = turtle.Turtle()\\nriver.speed(10)\\nriver.color(\'blue\')\\n\\n# Draw the river\\nriver.penup()\\nriver.goto(-300, -100)\\nriver.pendown()\\nriver.goto(300, -100)\\n\\n# Exit the screen when clicked\\nscreen.exitonclick()", "basename": "river_drawing"}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
